core

Class DataSourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.DataSourceManager

  • public final class DataSourceManager
extends Object
    Manages access to @link{DataSource}s.
    Author:
    Philip

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static List<Class<? extends DataSource>> dataSources
      The list of data sources.
      private static Class<? extends DataSource> defaultDataSource
      The default source.

    • Method Detail

      • deRegisterDataSource

        public static void deRegisterDataSource(DataSource dataSource)
                                 throws DataSourceException
        De-register a data source. Can't deregister the default
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The source to de-register
        Throws:
        DataSourceException - Thrown if the source is the default

      • getData

           Identifier identifier)
        Retrieves data for an object of a given class with a provided ID.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class
        identifier - The identifier of the object to fetch.
        Returns:
        The data

      • getDataSource

        Retrieve the default data source.
        Returns:
        The data source

        Get a data source by entry number.
        Parameters:
        source - The number of entry
        Returns:
        The source

      • registerDataSource

        public static void registerDataSource(Class<? extends DataSource> clazz,
                      boolean defaultSource)
        Register a data source and optionally set it as default.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The source to register
        defaultSource - Whether to set it as the default

        Parameters:

        Returns:
